Airstream Studio

Sussex Wedding Suppliers

Our reccommended suppliers for vintage and retro weddings in Sussex. If you have a quality wedding service or a wedding venue in Sussex and would like to become one of our preffered suppliers please contact us.

Gin & Bear It

Brighton's own Morris Minor based Gin Bar
Gin and Bear It!® supply a professional mobile gin bar service for your special occasion. If you need a birthday bar, wedding bar, corporate bar or any other type of event bar, we have it covered.

Pangdean Barn

Pangdean offers an intimate and atmospheric function venue set against the backdrop of the rolling South Downs. At the heart of our working farm lies our magnificent oak-framed Sussex barn. Built in 1720, the Old Barn has been lovingly restored to offer you a unique wedding or function venue that is exclusively yours for the day. We often work at Pangdean Barn and highly recommend the venue and staff.

Fitzleroi Barn

Fitzleroi Function and Wedding Barn is situated on a beautiful West Sussex farm in the stunning West Sussex countryside. The function Barn benefits from a private courtyard which guests have full and exclusive use of.

Wadhurst Castle

Wadhurst Castle is a striking and unique country house wedding venue on the Kent and East Sussex border commanding magnificent panoramic views of the beautiful Sussex countryside. A licensed venue for weddings and civil partnership ceremonies, Wadhurst Castle has a choice of three licensed rooms for indoor marriage ceremonies and the newly restored stunning walled garden for outdoor ceremonies.

Slinn Hawkins Weddings

Tell me what you’ve always hoped your wedding would be and we will work together to make your dream a reality.

Elizabeth Avey Wedding Dresses

A breath-taking vintage wedding dress collection.

Sylvia's Kitchen

Amazing wedding cake creations and catering.

Falcon Wedding Cars

Falcon Wedding Cars in East Sussex are dedicated to providing the perfect classic vintage wedding car hire. We cover all areas of East Sussex and West Sussex including Brighton and Eastbourne. Let us help you make your wedding day extra special.

Velvet Storm Photography

We specialize in high end photography of all aspects - including beautiful wedding photography, fashion and commercial shoots and using the very best digital technology to create beautiful images.

We want to provide our clients with photographs that promote discussion and invoke memories. We want them to have images that show that a photograph can be more than a simple record of what has taken place – it can be beautiful, artistic and inspirational. We love to work with clients who are looking for that ‘extra special’ element to their photographic requirements, and fulfill their dreams and ideas.
